Trade/Device Name(s): Borrelia burgdorferi B31 IgM Line Blot Test Kit
Analyte(s): IgM antibodies to Borrelia burgdorferi sensu stricto (B31)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Gold Standard Diagnostics Borrelia burgdorferi B31 IgM Line Blot Test Kit for qualitative detection of IgM antibodies to B. burgdorferi in human serum
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of IgM antibodies to B. burgdorferi sensu stricto (B31) in human serum for samples found positive or equivocal by ELISA or IFA, providing supportive evidence of infection
